column3: The face of an injured Sekiseigumi blade is twisted in pain.
Use the milky white salve on the injured Sekiseigumi blade.
Ugh... <pant> I must...get word to my brother. But these wounds... I cannot.
You... You don't look to be one of them. I take great risk trusting you, but I've no other choice. Nor the time. Please, hear me out.
I am a blade of the Sekiseigumi, and I <wince> came under attack by a foreign devil while on patrol. I fear my fellow blade may meet with the same fate if not warned.
I... I will survive. <grunt> But my Sekiseigumi brother must be told of this attack. He patrols an alley off Kogane Dori. Please, go with haste.
I... I will survive. <grunt> But my Sekiseigumi brother must be told of this attack. He patrols an alley off Kogane Dori. Please, go with haste.
What do you want of me?
My brother blade? Attacked by a foreign devil? And one so skilled as to injure one of the Sekiseigumi's most gifted... Rushing after this fiend on my own would be rushing to my own death.
I would ask your help in this. Use this milky white salve on the injured Sekiseigumi blade that sent you to me. For my part, I will send for reinforcements from the barracks.
Did you see word to my brother blade?
He sent you back with this salve? <groan> Thank you. And thank the gods he is safe.
Worry not. My pain is mostly gone. My apologies for pulling you into this. But I see now I was right to trust you.
As I told you, my attackers hail from across the seas. Violence is forbidden in Kugane, but those from abroad have little love for our laws.
My brother blade and I broke up their illicit dealings some time ago. No doubt they did not take kindly to that. My guess is they gathered their gil and hired an assassin.
Little did they know, we Sekiseigumi are not so easily killed. I hazard my brethren blades have already hunted these scoundrels down and gaoled them by now.
You did us a service this day. As one who wears the haori of the Sekiseigumi, on behalf of us all, I thank you.
